sn2.23:1.1: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho serī devaputto bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn2.23:8.1: Bhūtapubbāhaṃ, bhante, sirī nāma rājā ahosiṃ dāyako dānapati dānassa vaṇṇavādī.
sn2.23:8.2: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, catūsu dvāresu dānaṃ dīyittha samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṃ.
sn2.23:8.3: Atha kho maṃ, bhante, itthāgāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
sn2.23:8.4: ‘devassa kho dānaṃ dīyati; amhākaṃ dānaṃ na dīyati.
sn2.23:8.5: Sādhu mayampi devaṃ nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma, puññāni kareyyāmā’ti.
sn2.23:8.9: So khvāhaṃ, bhante, paṭhamaṃ dvāraṃ itthāgārassa adāsiṃ.
sn2.23:8.10: Tattha itthāgārassa dānaṃ dīyittha; mama dānaṃ paṭikkami.
sn2.23:9.1: Atha kho maṃ, bhante, khattiyā anuyantā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ:
sn2.23:9.2: ‘devassa kho dānaṃ dīyati; itthāgārassa dānaṃ dīyati; amhākaṃ dānaṃ na dīyati.
sn2.23:9.3: Sādhu mayampi devaṃ nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma, puññāni kareyyāmā’ti.
sn2.23:9.7: So khvāhaṃ, bhante, dutiyaṃ dvāraṃ khattiyānaṃ anuyantānaṃ adāsiṃ.
sn2.23:9.8: Tattha khattiyānaṃ anuyantānaṃ dānaṃ dīyittha, mama dānaṃ paṭikkami.
sn2.23:10.1: Atha kho maṃ, bhante, balakāyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
sn2.23:10.2: ‘devassa kho dānaṃ dīyati; itthāgārassa dānaṃ dīyati; khattiyānaṃ anuyantānaṃ dānaṃ dīyati; amhākaṃ dānaṃ na dīyati.
sn2.23:10.3: Sādhu mayampi devaṃ nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma, puññāni kareyyāmā’ti.
sn2.23:10.7: So khvāhaṃ, bhante, tatiyaṃ dvāraṃ balakāyassa adāsiṃ.
sn2.23:10.8: Tattha balakāyassa dānaṃ dīyittha, mama dānaṃ paṭikkami.
sn2.23:11.1: Atha kho maṃ, bhante, brāhmaṇagahapatikā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ:
sn2.23:11.2: ‘devassa kho dānaṃ dīyati; itthāgārassa dānaṃ dīyati; khattiyānaṃ anuyantānaṃ dānaṃ dīyati; balakāyassa dānaṃ dīyati; amhākaṃ dānaṃ na dīyati.
sn2.23:11.3: Sādhu mayampi devaṃ nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma, puññāni kareyyāmā’ti.
sn2.23:11.7: So khvāhaṃ, bhante, catutthaṃ dvāraṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ adāsiṃ.
sn2.23:11.8: Tattha brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ dānaṃ dīyittha, mama dānaṃ paṭikkami.
sn2.23:12.1: Atha kho maṃ, bhante, purisā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ:
sn2.23:12.2: ‘na kho dāni devassa koci dānaṃ dīyatī’ti.
sn2.23:12.3: Evaṃ vuttāhaṃ, bhante, te purise etadavocaṃ:
sn2.23:12.4: ‘tena hi, bhaṇe, yo bāhiresu janapadesu āyo sañjāyati tato upaḍḍhaṃ antepure pavesetha, upaḍḍhaṃ tattheva dānaṃ detha samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānan’ti.
sn2.23:12.5: So khvāhaṃ, bhante, evaṃ dīgharattaṃ katānaṃ puññānaṃ evaṃ dīgharattaṃ katānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pariyantaṃ nādhigacchāmi—
sn2.23:12.6: ettakaṃ puññanti vā ettako puññavipākoti vā ettakaṃ sagge ṭhātabbanti vāti.
